summary: Due to his sister's death, the 32 year old August returns and consequently abandons his profession as a missionary priest. His beloved sister Christina, who went from greatness to decay as ... See full summary »
cast: Thure Lindhardt|Stine Fischer Christensen|Jens Arentzen|Rasmus Bjerg|Jiming Cai|Liv Corfixen|Ida Dwinger|Mira Hilli Møller Hallund|Rikke Hallund|Henrik Ipsen|Tommy Kenter|Margrethe Koytu|Søren Lenander|Karen Rosenberg|Campbell Snavely|Christian Tafdrup|Peter van Hoof|Niels Weyde|Gunnar Wille
title: Princess
